== Introduction ==
Founded and Created in 6th of July, 2013, <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~lubuntu-brainstorming | Lubuntu Brainstorming Team]]</nowiki>  will coordinate and work closely with each and every other Sub-Team within Lubuntu Community and also have a mutual collaboration with other projects and communities within the Ubuntu Family.

* '''Tip''': <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brainstorming | Brainstorming]]</nowiki>

== Motto ==
We believe that  '''''all of us are smarter than one of us '''''.

== Purpose ==
# Planning For Lubuntu+1 Release 15.04 and LXQt
# Encourage and Motivate The Team Work Spirit
# Build a Community Based on Sharing Thoughts, Contributions and Friendly Environment
# Not Necessarily Discussing Development Ideas But Anything Related to Lubuntu
# Come Up With an Idea > Discuss it > Improve it > Vote > Implement

== Joining The Team ==
Please, send a request to join the team on <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~lubuntu-brainstorming | Launchpad]]</nowiki>

* Members of this Team can, of course, also be members of other Lubuntu Sub-Teams they may be interested in.

== How to Contribute ==
Interested to make Lubuntu 15.04 the best release ever and help with LXQt? please, register your idea as a Blueprint - '''<nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/lubuntu-brainstorming | See this]]</nowiki>'''. You will need a Launchpad Account. Or simply, check the <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/lubuntu-brainstorming/+specs?show=all | list of all the blueprints]]</nowiki> which have been registered already. 

=== HOWTO Edit The Whiteboard ===
The steps are very easy and simple:

1. Click on <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuGNOME/Brainstorming?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=step1.png | the Blueprint]]</nowiki> you would like to edit.

1. Click on the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuGNOME/Brainstorming?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=step2.png | Yellow icon]]</nowiki> which says "Edit Whiteboard".

1. Add your name/username/launchpad name between two '''['''yourname''']'''.

1. Post your suggestion at the end of the whiteboard.

1. Once done, click on the Green Icon to accept the changes.

1. You are Done.
